original: Hi everyone. I'm here to talk about high street. So I'm going to talk about high street about my classroom. Something wrong happened when I was reading a book. Somebody touched my arm and I felt like a big hand in my shoulder. After that I went to the bathroom and I called my mom to tell her that I was feeling terrible about that.
limpio: Hello everyone. I want to share an experience I had in the classroom regarding high street. While reading a book, I felt someone touch my arm, causing me to feel a large hand on my shoulder. Feeling uncomfortable, I went to the bathroom and called my mom to discuss how I was feeling about the incident.
titulo: Exploring the Impact of Unwanted Physical Contact in the Academic Environment
